snippet.title: Tape Recovery Simulator 96K trailer
snippet.description:
Caffeine Withdrawal Games presents the first in a hopefully long line of games you haven't played before: Tape Recovery Simulator 96K.
TRS96K brings back the lost art of loading data from tapes.
By default, data doesn't want to be loaded. You'll need a lot of tweaking to pull it out from the decaying state it likes to linger in. 

There is a lot of data be discovered and rescued by the wannabe Tape Recovery Specialist (up to 600 Kb/ tape): 8bit minigames, stories, fake art, conspiracy theories, 8bit software, reminders of a great time gone forever. 
TRS96K will be complete with the 8bit look & feel we all crave for.

Before even considering starting your work recovering tapes, you need something else. Yes, you guessed it. Management. Can you even breathe without a boss stressing you in a gentle yet horrible way ? TRS96K will be the home of the most meaningless boss featured in a game. Armed with powreful yet subtle weapons: pressure cooker, chaos, stress, email client, caffe breath* and blatant disregard of reality, Darlibatis is the single boss of TRS96K.

*Thankfully TRS96K does not support any kind of digital scent technology.

Amazing music featured in the trailer: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d9fw7qgTzGs

Further information:
http://caffeinewithdrawalgames.com/
http://caffeinewithdrawalgames.com/presskit/index.php
http://caffeinewithdrawalgames.com/TRS/details.html
https://twitter.com/cawigames
